title: Robin Roberts
itunes:author: American Public Media
description:
Robin Roberts and Tig catch up on growing up in Mississippi in this chat from December. Plus, Tig and Robin advise on recreational space travel and making career choices, and they name a cat from Jersey!

This episode is sponsored by Indeed (indeed.com/tig) and Betterhelp (betterhelp.com/tigÂ discount code tig)
